main event: A sighting of a teardrop or comet shaped object was reported in Clinton, Tennessee on June 8, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately four minutes,It emitted blue and orange jet-like light,The object was four to five feet long and had a comet-like tail,The object flew slowly towards observers before rising at an angle and disappearing,The conclusion indicated that the sighting was probably caused by an aircraft.
witness description: Mrs. [REDACTED], Clinton, Tennessee and Mrs. [REDACTED], Clinton, Tennessee.
